newsitem.title: MEXICO: Bank of America seeks Mexico expansion.
newsitem.headline: Bank of America seeks Mexico expansion.

text.p: As a step toward further expansion in Mexico, Bank of America has opened an office in Mexico's second city of Guadalajara.

"(We) are very interested in the country in general and thus in expanding our business around Mexico... with three offices, now, we believe they will offer very complete coverage of most foreign trade activity," said James McCabe, Bank of America representative in Mexico.
The Guadalajara office will seek clients among large corporations and transnationals located there, the bank said. (( --Monica Ballesca, Guadalajara newsroom +523 817-0397))
